title: Claire of the Sea Light by Edwidge Danticat

content.question: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how Danticat uses literary elements and techniques to convey setting.

frqParts.text: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how Danticat uses literary elements and techniques to convey setting.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify and describe specific textual details that convey or reveal a setting.
